tool_description: API showing news and articles relating to AI and Machine Learning.
name: AI news
title: AI news

api_list.name: Get news from specific source
api_list.description: Get only the news from one source within the API sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/mit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{websiteid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all AI news
api_list.description: Returns all news related to AI from the websites used by the API
